title: Research Seminar in Washington, DC
description: (Same as COGS 194, COMM 194, HITO 193, POLI 194, SOCI 194, SIO 194.) Course attached to six-unit internship taken by students participating in the UCDC Program. Involves weekly seminar meetings with faculty and teaching assistant and a substantial research paper. Prerequisites: department approval and participating in UCDC Program.
